verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Eledumare, Atobiju
Agunechemba, Awimayeun
Eledumare, Alagbada Ina
Agunechemba, Orimiratata

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
My very Soul will Sing Hallelujah,
Yahweh, Yahweh
My very Soul will Sing Hallelujah,
Yahweh, Yahweh

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Eledumare, Alade Ogo
Odumeje, Odumalo,
Akiri sore, Asore Kiri
Eledumare, Gbani, gbani tan sa ya
Kiniun eya Judah, Ekwueme

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
My very Soul will Cry Abba Father,
Yahweh, Yahweh
My very Soul will Cry Abba Father
Yahweh, Yahweh

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
My very Soul will Sing Hallelujah,
Yahweh, Yahweh
My very Soul will Sing Hallelujah,
Yahweh, Yahweh

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
You are God, You are God
You’re God, You’re God

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
I have Jesus in my life
Living for his glory
I’m on fire everyday
And nothing can stop me
Doesn’t matter what I face
I am getting bigger everyday

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
We’re getting bigger everyday
Bigger everyday
We’re getting bigger everyday
Bigger everyday
No limitations
We’ve taken over
We’re getting bigger everyday

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
Not by power, not by might
But by the Spirit of the living God oh
Anything is possible
Bigger than we used to be
We have moved
I say we have moved
